Join the Winter Data Science School

Explore Next Generation AI, Network with Experts, and Gain Practical Skills.

February 24-25, 2025

EMINES, UM6P: Université Mohammed VI Polytechnique, Ben Guerir

winterschooldatascience@gmail.com

Register Now View Program

About the Winter School

Our Winter Data Science School focuses on Next Generation AI and its Economic Applications. We aim to provide deep insights into the latest techniques, foster networking, and offer practical skills.

Over two days, participants will engage in expert-led sessions, including Charles-Albert Lehalle on AI in finance, and presentations by Michael Jordan and Yann LeCun, offering valuable insights into the transformation of AI products and its societal impact.

Stay connected through LinkedIn!

LinkedIn

Highlights of the Next-Gen AI Winter School

Keynote Presentations

Explore the latest advancements in Next Generation AI and economic applications and gain insights from globally recognized speakers.

Business Case Studies

Discover how Next-Generation AI is revolutionizing industries through impactful real-world examples.

Dynamic Panel Discussions

Engage with experts in lively discussions about economic applications of Next Generation AI and its transformative impact on society.

Networking Opportunities

Connect with researchers, industry leaders, and innovators while exploring groundbreaking AI research and ideas in our interactive poster sessions.

Who Should Attend

This Next-Gen AI Winter School is designed for anyone passionate about the future of AI. Whether you're looking to dive deep into Next Generation AI or expand your network, this is the perfect opportunity.

PhD and Master's Students

Stay ahead of the curve in AI research and innovations.

Engineers & Data Scientists

Engage with cutting-edge technologies and apply them to real-world problems.

Entrepreneurs & Innovators

Learn how AI is transforming industries and how to leverage it for new ventures.

Industry Professionals

Network with leading AI professionals and discover the future of AI in business.

Venue

Mark your calendar! The Next-Gen AI Winter School will take place on February 24-25, 2025, in the main room of the Conference Center at EMINES, UM6P: Université Mohammed VI Polytechnique, Ben Guerir
